entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 in the morning then to 60 early in the afternoon except south 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
